subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Santa Anita Derby
lead_paragraph: The trainer Art Sherman, 77, was an exercise rider for the 1955 Derby winner, Swaps, but he has never had a Derby entrant until California Chrome, the race favorite.
snippet: The trainer Art Sherman, 77, was an exercise rider for the 1955 Derby winner, Swaps, but he has never had a Derby entrant until California Chrome, the race favorite.
